com.javierorbe.neuron

Class NeuralNetwork

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.javierorbe.neuron.NeuralNetwork

  • public class NeuralNetwork
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a neural network.
    See Also:
    Neural network in Wikipedia

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NeuralNetwork(int[] layers)
      Construct a neural network with randomized values with the sigmoid function as the activation function and with a learning rate of 0.1.
      NeuralNetwork(int[] layers, ActivationFunction activationFunction, double learningRate)
      Construct a neural network with randomized values for the weights and biases.
      NeuralNetwork(int[] layers, ActivationFunction activationFunction, double learningRate, com.javierorbe.math.Matrix[] weights, com.javierorbe.math.Matrix[] biases)
      Construct a neural network.

      Mutate the network weights and biases.

      • NeuralNetwork

        public NeuralNetwork(int[] layers,
                     ActivationFunction activationFunction,
                     double learningRate,
                     com.javierorbe.math.Matrix[] weights,
                     com.javierorbe.math.Matrix[] biases)
        Construct a neural network.
        Parameters:
        layers - number of nodes in each layer.
        activationFunction - the activation function.
        learningRate - the learning rate.
        weights - the weights of the network.
        biases - the biases of the network.

        activationFunction - the activation function.
        learningRate - the learning rate.

      • NeuralNetwork

        public NeuralNetwork(int[] layers)
        Construct a neural network with randomized values with the sigmoid function as the activation function and with a learning rate of 0.1.
        Parameters:
        layers - number of nodes in each layer.
